channel.title: How to make the "waterfall"
channel.description:
This is a tutorial explaining how to create a device used for smoking maryjane. I do believe there are certain health risks, but personally i dont give a flying fuck.(sorry if im not alloud to say that) :|
[u]Items Needed[/u] 1. Gatorade Bottle (empty) 2. Socket 3. Lighter 4. weed 5. sink
Okay, first you need to use your lighter to heat up the top side of the bottle cap to just about where it starts melting.
Then, push the socket in the center of the heated cap, quickly, before it cools down. The socket should be halfway through the cap, with a tight fit.
Next, melt a hole in the bottom of the bottle, small enough for your finger to plug it.
Plug the hole, fill bottle with water, screw on the cap with the socket(packed with weed) and hold the lighter above the socket.
Un-plug the hole (with the lighter lit and in place) and let all the water drain out.
Now you should have a gatorade bottle filled with smoke. Open the cap, and inhale! :eek:
hold that shit in untill your ass falls off. you should then be pretty damn high. :D

item.title: How to make the "waterfall"
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:15, topic:215335”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=283045.msg2305547#msg2305547 date=1214817858]
I’ve never been able to make a decent hole with a sharp object either, I end up crushing the bottle and/or making some shitty hole that doesn’t seal well.
[/quote]

Yeh, I reckon only a knife would work… keys definitely do not. Billygotshot is bull shitting.[/quote]

I knife works, but it doesn’t make a nice round hole.

I always use my butane torch to make holes in bottles. It works so perfect.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the "waterfall"
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:12, topic:215335”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=283045.msg2305370#msg2305370 date=1214809824]

btw instead of burning a hole take a screw driver and just make a hole.

This usually just cracks the bottle open.

Burning is the best way in my opinion. It’s actually very easy and makes a perfect hole.

WTF bottle are you using? I can do it pretty easily with any bottle.
[/quote]

A plastic bottle? I find it doesnt just puncture a hole, it just make a long crack in it.[/quote]

? I dont see how you can not make a hole. It seems quit obvious I use a screwdriver… Makes a perfect round hole.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the "waterfall"
item.dc:creator: @Killa_Chronic Killa Chronic
item.description:
@Killa_Chronic wrote:

I was talking about the gas lingering in a room with no wind -.-

Dude, Come on… It’s not like your having a bon fire of plastic bottles. Your simply burning 2 holes hardly any fumes/smoke comes from that.

Do you know if the speed at which the water goes out matters?

yes, the speed does matter. The slower, the better (as long as there is enough pull for the lighter to burn the weed). You can either make a smaller hole, or keep half the hole plugged and let water drain from the other half.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the "waterfall"
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I believe something similar to this was posted before, under the title “how to make the most of your weed”.

Anyway, I tried this a while back, it was a pain in the ass to do and definitely a stranger taste. I did it in a big 2 litre bottle so you could say the smoke was pretty thin, that was probably why. Do you know if the speed at which the water goes out matters?

EDIT: What we did instead of burning something into the cap was take the cap off, put kitchen foil in the top and pierced a few holes in it.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the "waterfall"
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Killa Chronic:

[quote]So you hold your breathe for like 5 minutes so you can make the hole let it cool and everything to go away?

You dont need to hold your breathe… just make sure your not inhaling the fumes coming off the plastic. Also, it doesnt take 5 minutes to make the hole. It is closer to about 7-10 seconds…[/quote]

I was talking about the gas lingering in a room with no wind -.-

NOTE: I may be wrong, but I am pretty sure I’m right. ;)[/quote]
